Prophetic Defense.name: Prophetic Defense
Prophetic Defense.fullText:
Mithral Arm Utility 12Prophetic Defense

You see your opponent’s attack before it happens and twist away.

Encounter        Teleportation
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: You are hit by an attack

Effect: You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, you can teleport 6 squares.


Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 10.
Prophetic Defense.flavor: You see your opponent’s attack before it happens and twist away.
Prophetic Defense.range:
Personal

Trigger: You are hit by an attack

Effect: You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, you can teleport 6 squares.
Prophetic Defense.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Prophetic Defense.effect: You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, you can teleport 6 squares.

Dimension Strike.name: Dimension Strike
Dimension Strike.fullText:
Mithral Arm Attack 20Dimension Strike

You ride the waves of the Astral Sea to your opponent and away to safety.

Daily        Teleportation
Standard Action      Personal

Effect: You teleport 5 squares and use one of your encounter attack powers. You can use a power you have already expended this encounter, and using it does not expend it. The attack deals +1d10 damage and deals half damage on a miss. After the attack resolves, you can teleport 5 squares.


Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 10.
Dimension Strike.flavor: You ride the waves of the Astral Sea to your opponent and away to safety.
Dimension Strike.range:
Personal
